channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Teriyaki salmon with asian noodle salad
item.description:
Teriyaki salmon with asian noodle salad



Easy Teriyaki Salmon served on a bed of Asian Noodles made with brown rice noodles, fresh veggies and a homemade Asian Sesame Dressing! A light, simple refreshing recipe for the summer!.

item.title: Sweet potato in tomato, lime and cardamom sauce
item.description:
Sweet potato in tomato, lime and cardamom sauce



.

item.title: Andy the gasman's stew
item.description:
Andy the gasman's stew



Throw this meat stew with chunky veg and chickpeas together, cook it slowly and tweak it your way..

item.title: Gnocchi alla sorrentina
item.description:
Gnocchi alla sorrentina



Baked gnocchi with tomato and mozzarella.

item.title: Shrimp scampi
item.description:
Shrimp scampi



Fun Fact: Shrimp Scampi is an amalgamation of many different traditional Italian preparations of scampi (otherwise known as langoustines, Dublin Bay prawns, or Norway Lobsters). Therefore, there isnâ€™t one correct way in which to make it. Try swapping out the pasta in our recipes for rice, or even just a loaf of crusty bread..
